definition: to use up/to exhaust/to end/to finish/to the utmost/exhausted/finished/to the limit (of sth)/all/entirely
to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to

sentences.english: Our project ought to proceed at a reasonably quick tempo. Surely one month is ample time, isn't it?
sentences.chinese: 那个商量必需尽速停止。唯一月的时间因该够了吧？

sentences.english: Thank you in advance for your concern and attention. Please let me hear from you as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 预先感谢阁下对我的关怀，并敬请尽速赐函示知。

sentences.english: Space is limited, please submit this form ASAP.
sentences.chinese: 因名额有限，请尽速将本表寄回，以免向隅。

sentences.english: Seek medical treatment for unusual symptoms as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 如有不寻常症状，尽速寻求医疗协助。

sentences.english: A: Let's send a fax to our Hong Kong office first thing Monday.
sentences.chinese: 让我们在星期一尽速发一份传真给我们香港办事处。

sentences.english: We advise you, therefore, to accept this offer without loss of time.
sentences.chinese: 故我方建议贵方尽速接受此报价。

sentences.english: Please rush me (ie send me immediately) your current catalogue.
sentences.chinese: 请将你方现有目录尽速寄来为盼。

sentences.english: Please inform our office should there be any special requests.
sentences.chinese: 如有任何其他要求，请尽速通知本处。

sentences.english: You can rest assured that we shall revert to your enquiry as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 请放心，我方以后将尽速重新处理你的询盘。

sentences.english: The present Treaty is subject to ratification, and the instruments of ratification shall be exchanged in Dar es Salaam as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 本条约须经批准，批准书应尽速在北京互换。

definition: variant of 聯絡|联络[lian2 luo4]
lit. slow no aid to urgent (idiom); slow measures will not address a critical situation/too slow to meet a pressing need
variant of 伺機|伺机[si4 ji1]
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
to handle in accordance with (the rules)
to go on a journey/to leave
